name: Mutant Monster Balls
description:
Raaawwwwrrrr!!

Aim, Shoot, Bounce, and Pop your way through dozens of monstrous levels! Conquer the challenges of a unique world that includes creepy forests, decaying deserts, and monster cities - all in awesome retro 8-bit!!!!

- Saga style gameplay shows your friends' progress.
- Utilize awesome boosters to get master scores and beat your friends!
- Send and receive gifts to your friends.
- Spin the Monster Slots to get special rewards & prizes!
- Tons of monster types for added variety and challenge.
- Powerups including Multi-balls, pyro bombs, sand worms, and more!
- New levels added all the time!

If you enjoy Mutant Monster Balls, tell your friends! Thanks for your support!
